00015 void bisection(Parameters *params, AveragePopulationStatistics *avg_stats)
00016 {
00017   AveragePopulationStatistics current_avg_stats;
00018   Parameters *current_params = new Parameters;
00019   int result;
00020   int quiet=params->quiet_mode;
00021 
00022   params->quiet_mode=1;
00023   params->verbose_mode=0;
00024 
00025   // make the first set of runs
00026 
00027   *current_params = *params;
00028   result=do_runs(current_params,&current_avg_stats,quiet);
00029   
00030   int minN=0;
00031   int maxN=0;
00032 
00033   if (result)
00034     {
00035       // if successful, try to halve population size until failure
00036 
00037       *avg_stats=current_avg_stats;
00038 
00039       while (result)
00040         {
00041           current_params->population_size/=2;
00042           result=do_runs(current_params,&current_avg_stats,quiet);
00043 
00044           if (result)
00045             *avg_stats=current_avg_stats;
00046         };
00047       
00048       // set initial population size bounds
00049 
00050       minN=current_params->population_size;
00051       maxN=minN*2;
00052     }
00053   else
00054     {
00055       // if failure, double population size until success
00056 
00057       while (!result)
00058         {
00059           current_params->population_size*=2;
00060           result=do_runs(current_params,&current_avg_stats,quiet);
00061 
00062           if (result)
00063             *avg_stats=current_avg_stats;
00064         };
00065       
00066       // set initial population size bounds
00067 
00068       maxN=current_params->population_size;
00069       minN=maxN/2;
00070     }
00071 
00072   // perform bisection until interval width is at most 5% of the
00073   // lower bound
00074 
00075   while ((((double)maxN-minN)/minN)>0.05)
00076     {
00077       // try to make a set of runs in the middle of the interval
00078 
00079       current_params->population_size=(minN+maxN)/2;
00080       result=do_runs(current_params,&current_avg_stats,quiet);
00081 
00082       if (result)
00083         *avg_stats=current_avg_stats;
00084 
00085       // success goes halves the interval downwards, failure upwards
00086 
00087       if (result)
00088         maxN=current_params->population_size;
00089       else
00090         minN=current_params->population_size;
00091     }
00092 
00093   if (quiet==0)
00094     {
00095       printf("Finished bisection with N=%u\n",avg_stats->population_size);
00096       separator(stdout);
00097     };
00098 
00099   delete current_params;
00100 }
00101 
00102 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 
00107 int do_runs(Parameters *params, AveragePopulationStatistics *avg_stats, int quiet)
00108 {
00109   PopulationStatistics *stats = new PopulationStatistics[params->num_bisection_runs];
00110   int run;
00111   int failed=0;
00112   
00113   for (run=0; (run<params->num_bisection_runs)&&(!failed); run++)
00114     {
00115       int result=one_run(params,&stats[run]);
00116       failed=!result;
00117     };
00118   
00119   if (quiet==0)
00120     printf("bisection -> %2u / %2u successes with N=%u\n",
00121            run,params->num_bisection_runs,params->population_size);
00122   
00123   average_population_statistics(avg_stats,stats,params->num_bisection_runs);
00124 
00125   delete[] stats;
00126 
00127   if (failed)
00128     return 0;
00129   else
00130     return 1;
00131 }

00138 void print_bisection_summary(FILE *f, AveragePopulationStatistics *stats)
00139 {
00140   fprintf(f,"Bisection summary output:\n");
00141   fprintf(f,"   num_runs        = %u\n",stats->num_runs);
00142   fprintf(f,"   avg_best_found  = %f\n",stats->avg_maxF);
00143   fprintf(f,"   avg_num_evals   = %f\n",stats->avg_num_evals);
00144   fprintf(f,"   pop_size        = %u\n",stats->population_size);
00145 }
